NavigatorUAData.summary: The NavigatorUAData interface of the returns information about the browser and operating system of a user.

remarks.para: An instance of this object is returned by calling . Therefore, this interface has no constructor.

blockquote.para: Note: The terms high entropy and low entropy refer to the amount of information these values reveal about the browser. The values returned as properties are deemed low entropy, and unlikely to identify a user. The values returned by could potentially reveal more information. These values are therefore retrieved via a {{jsxref("Promise")}}, allowing time for the browser to request user permission, or make other checks.

remarks.para: -Improving user privacy and developer experience with User-Agent Client Hints

NavigatorUAData.returns: In the following value a number of hints are requested using the method. When the promise resolves, this information is printed to the console.
